code: import Style from"ol/style/Style";import Stroke from"ol/style/Stroke";import Fill from"ol/style/Fill";export var activeToggleColor='rgba(141,174,16,1)';export var strokeOpacity=0.75;export var fillOpacity=0.25;export var selectedColor=["rgba(141,174, 16,".concat(strokeOpacity,")"),"rgba(141,174, 16,".concat(fillOpacity,")")];export var defaultColor=["rgba(0,53,96,".concat(strokeOpacity,")"),"rgba(0,103,188,".concat(fillOpacity,")")];export var trackColor=["rgba(168,0,2,".concat(strokeOpacity,")"),"rgba(50,188,0,".concat(strokeOpacity,")")];export var insertedStyle=new Style({stroke:new Stroke({color:trackColor[1],width:2})});export var selectedStyle=new Style({stroke:new Stroke({color:selectedColor[0],width:3}),fill:new Fill({color:selectedColor[1]})});export function defaultStyle(feature){var style=new Style({stroke:new Stroke({color:feature.get('visited')?selectedColor[0]:defaultColor[0],width:1}),fill:new Fill({color:feature.get('visited')?selectedColor[1]:defaultColor[1]})});return style;}
